Exception hierarchy for Equinix API errors.

    Class
    Description
    class 
    EquinixAuthenticationException
    Thrown when the Equinix API returns HTTP 401 Unauthorized.
    class 
    EquinixAuthorizationException
    Thrown when the Equinix API returns HTTP 403 Forbidden.
    class 
    EquinixClientException
    Thrown for client-side errors such as request building failures, serialization errors, or network connectivity issues.
    class 
    EquinixConflictException
    Thrown when the Equinix API returns HTTP 409 Conflict.
    class 
    EquinixNotFoundException
    Thrown when the Equinix API returns HTTP 404 Not Found.
    class 
    EquinixRateLimitException
    Thrown when the Equinix API returns HTTP 429 Too Many Requests.
    class 
    EquinixServerException
    Thrown when the Equinix API returns an HTTP 5xx server error (500, 502, 503, 504).
    class 
    EquinixServiceException
    Thrown when the Equinix API returns an error HTTP response.
